CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISBLANK(DB_Code_Activite_NACE__c), ISBLANK(Segmentation__r.CodeNACE__c) ), 2.5, IF( AND( DB_Code_Activite_NACE__c = Segmentation__r.CodeNACE__c, Segmentation__r.NotationPotentielExtension__c <>0 ), Segmentation__r.NotationPotentielExtension__c, 2.5 ) )
